data.title: Family Supper Outing
data.text: Outstanding food at a reasonable price for the amount and quality of food you are getting. Great that the salad bar is so well  stocked. The service was excellent and the servers were all very pleasant. Could not ask for a better place to have an evening out for dinner with the family.

owner_response.author: Bonnie S, Public Relations Manager at Tucanos Brazilian Grill, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for taking the time to share your kind words with us! We can't wait to have you and your family back for another great evening out!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Fun!
data.text: We had a group of around 40 show up for dinner at this restaurant located next door to the Marriott we were staying at in City Center, Newport News.  Had a terrific time with a fun staff making the event!

owner_response.author: Bonnie S, Public Relations Manager at Tucanos Brazilian Grill, responded to this review
owner_response.text: We are so happy to hear that we were able to make your visit to Newport News even better!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Love this place!
data.text: My husband and I went here for lunch it was great! all you can eat buffet including all you can eat meat if you are a meat lover you will want to go here it sits in city center in case you want to go to the movies or walk off all that food you just ate.

owner_response.author: Bonnie S, Public Relations Manager at Tucanos Brazilian Grill, responded to this review
owner_response.text: We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed our experience as well as our surrounding area! We can't wait to have you back!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Birthday Celebration
data.text: We were here for a birthday celebration. The food selections were plentiful. There were a few items that we really enjoyed and others not so much. The ambiance was nice as well. The price point is good too.

owner_response.author: Bonnie S, Public Relations Manager at Tucanos Brazilian Grill, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for celebrating your birthday with us!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Authentic Brasilian Food
data.text:
This place is fantastic and very similar to steak houses in Brasil. 
Even the grilled pineapple is the same as in Brasil. I highly recommend this restaurant.

owner_response.author: Bonnie S, Public Relations Manager at Tucanos Brazilian Grill, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for your visit and your review! We can't wait to see you again!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great experience at a different kind of restaurant!
data.text: Had a great time at this restaurant.  The salad bar was wonderful with a great selections of foods.  Choose the "meat" on the menu and they come out with individual skewers of different meats and give you a slice.  So you taste a lot of different flavors.  Really neat experience.

owner_response.author: Bonnie S, Public Relations Manager at Tucanos Brazilian Grill, responded to this review
owner_response.text: We are so excited we were able to treat you to a taste of Brazil!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Better the first time
data.text: We went here just about a year ago.  Service and food great.  This time, not so lucky.  No flan, no creme brulee.  Out of way too many things that were printed in the menu, not specials.  Not sure if i would give them a 3rd try after this visit.

owner_response.author: Bonnie S, Public Relations Manager at Tucanos Brazilian Grill, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us, Tim. We are truly sorry that we did not live up to the experience that you have come to expect from Tucanos. We take your comments very seriously and cannot apologize enough for not living up to your standards or our own. We will be sharing your review with our management team, so we can be sure to deliver the 5 star worthy experience that is our standard. We hope to show you the true Tucanos experience very soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Back for more...
data.text: If you're a meat lover, this is the restaurant for you. Constant flow of different types of meat arrive at your table until you turn the wooden block to red (stop.)  Don't get thick pieces, instead ask for thinner slides so that you can enjoy the savory taste.  Stick to medium rare for more succulent taste.  Enjoy!!!

owner_response.author: Bonnie S, Public Relations Manager at Tucanos Brazilian Grill, responded to this review
owner_response.text: We can't wait to have you back again and again!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: One of my favorite places
data.text: I love this place. The food is delicious and the meat servers are wonderful. They're very knowledgeable about the meats that they serve. And the Pineapple!!!!! Words cannot describe how great it is. I also like how they give you a free meal for your birthday each year. No other restaurant I know offers that.

owner_response.author: Bonnie S, Public Relations Manager at Tucanos Brazilian Grill, responded to this review
owner_response.text: We can't wait to celebrate with you again!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: GREAT FOOD
data.text:
it is a bit costly to eat here but I love it. When I consider the cost of other buffets now (not Chinese) this cost seems inline. If you don't like seasoning on your food this might not be the place for you. They season all their meats with Brazilian flair. 

The only down fall I found the last time I was there was I couldn't get the hot and cold bar with out ordering the meat. At that time I was fasting from meat and just wanted to be able to have potatos and some of the other hot items. The server told me hat the "Only Bar" option was just the salad and bread bar but did not include the hot bar.  

Over all I give this pace 5 stars and would eat here again. I love the fact its by the fountain and I am about to eat and then take a walk around the fountain.

owner_response.author: Bonnie S, Public Relations Manager at Tucanos Brazilian Grill, responded to this review
owner_response.text: We can't wait to have you for another escape from the ordinary!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Disappointing
data.text:
After having been to other Brazilian steakhouses (Myrtle Beach, Richmond etc), this one is a true disappointment. Have tried this one twice. The salad bar can be iffy and they are slow to refill hot dishes and breads on the buffet as they empty. The "good" meats come around less frequently than do the veggies on a stick. You have to ask for them, even when the table marker  is turned "Green" for service. 
With so many other good choice options for dining in the Hampton Roads area, this restaurant just doesn't measure up.

owner_response.author: Bonnie S, Public Relations Manager at Tucanos Brazilian Grill, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for your visit and your review. We strive to provide an abundant, fresh Salad Festival and a savory parade of meats. I am truly sorry to hear that we dropped the ball in delivering your favorite skewers, as well as keeping our award winning Salad Festival stocked for your enjoyment. We take your comments very seriously and will be sharing them with our team so these issues are fixed. We hope to show you the true Tucanos experience very soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Meger sampling of meat
data.text: I do like the meat that is brought around but wish that it would show up more frequently. The buffet has a great variety and very fresh.

owner_response.author: Bonnie S, Public Relations Manager at Tucanos Brazilian Grill, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for your visit and your review! It's great to hear that you loved the food! We will be sure to share your feedback regarding the speed of the meat service so you can have an even better experience next time!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Good service, great food
data.text:
My company reserved Tucanos for a lunch meeting and enjoyed it.

They organized one of their rooms so it would seat 25 and we had our own dedicated staff to take our orders.

They have an unlimited salad bar which includes soup and gumbo. 

We were served a variety of meat choices throughout your dining experience. They present the choices to you and you take as much as you need (sliced onto your plate).

The meat selection gives you everything from Steak, Beef Tenderloin, Turkey Wrapped Bacon to pineapple slices marinated in the perfect sauce.

They also have a full bar and a TV.

The also have outside seating and a view of a water fountain and a "LOVE" sign near the fountain perfect for photos.

It's a great dining experience.

owner_response.author: Bonnie S, Public Relations Manager at Tucanos Brazilian Grill, responded to this review
owner_response.text: We can't wait to host your next lunch 'meating'!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great food, unexpected price.
data.text: I have been to several other Brazilian grills.  This one is comparable to the others but at about half the price.  Too much food, but it was all so delicious.  I'll be back.

owner_response.author: Bonnie S, Public Relations Manager at Tucanos Brazilian Grill, responded to this review
owner_response.text: We can't wait to see you again!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Love!
data.text: I love this place! My favorite restaurant right now! I hate that I get full so quickly! I want to keep eating everything that the servers bring out

owner_response.author: Bonnie S, Public Relations Manager at Tucanos Brazilian Grill, responded to this review
owner_response.text: We are honored to be considered your favorite restaurant! We hope to see you again very soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Awesome experience!
data.text: This is well worth the money. The main thing you get (unless you specify otherwise) are random skewers of different meats, vegetables, and fruit. You have a marker on your table which you turn green up if you want more, and red up if you want to pause a little. I thoroughly enjoyed every skewer I tried, but the grilled pineapple was the best! I also enjoyed the pork. For our drink we all had the lemonade that they mix with different fruits. Mine was strawberry, my hubby's was guava. Both were delicious! An all you care to eat fruit, salad and side bar was included with our meal. I loved the fried bananas and the little Brazilian cheese biscuits! The desserts looked good, but we were too full to try them!

owner_response.author: Bonnie S, Public Relations Manager at Tucanos Brazilian Grill, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for your visit and your review! Next time, try to save room for our made from scratch desserts, they're just as good as the pineapple!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Awesome Brazilian Steak restaurant
data.text: Tucanos Grill is always amazing. The meat they serve is brought to the table fast and furious. The selection is delicious and provides some thing for everyone. If you are a carnivore, this place is worth the money. The wait staff is responsive and always upbeat. Expect to spend about $33 a person, but have a seat and eat till you get your fill. Fun experience and great eats!

owner_response.author: Bonnie S, Public Relations Manager at Tucanos Brazilian Grill, responded to this review
owner_response.text: We can't wait to fill you up again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Not impressed
data.text: I know everyone seems to love this place. I just didn't enjoy it. It's extremely expensive. The meat and fruit is cooked over each other, therefore cross contaminating meats on meats and meats on fruits. If you have any type of allergy or sensitivity you're screwed. The meat marinade wasn't as great as everyone claims. And some meat was actually dry. The salad bar had several options and looks amazing, but when you get down to it they were not that spectacular. Just typical tasting, simple salad bar options. I enjoyed the wait staff, they were very attentive and friendly. The restaurant has nice decor, and comfortable seating and air temps, and a clean restroom. I just can't agree with the hype.

owner_response.author: Bonnie S, Public Relations Manager at Tucanos Brazilian Grill, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for taking the time to share your valuable feedback with us, Emily. We are a fun and festive churrascaria that strives to provide a savory parade of meats, an abundant Salad Festival with over 70 hot and cold options and excellent service; all with accompanied by an affordable price tag. I am truly sorry that we did not live up to our reputation, or our standards on the day of our visit. We will be sharing your comments with our chefs, so you can have the experience that you have come to expect from Tucanos
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Just Average
data.text: I have been to Tucanos several times and each time it has gotten worse. Salad bar is well stocked and maintained, but that is not why you go to Tucanos. On this last visit, the meat service was lacking. The variety of meats was not the same as previous visits.

owner_response.author: Bonnie S, Public Relations Manager at Tucanos Brazilian Grill, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for your review and your valuable feedback. We strive to provide you with prompt and savory meat service that you can count on every time you visit. We are currently featuring a BBQ season menu which includes summertime favorites like dry rubbed BBQ wings, potato salad on the Salad Festival and bbq pulled pork, so our guests can enjoy some variety when they come at different times throughout the year. We will return to our traditional menu sometime in early September. We hope to show you the true Tucanos experience again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Average Across the Board
data.text: Had dinner at Tucanos on 7/11.  We only visit twice a year (because we get one meal free as part of their birthday club).  Service was OK from Brianna.  Meat server was very upbeat and positive.  He was great.  Salad bar does not have as many items on it as prior visits.  Meat is good and a nice variety is served.  Was disappointed they did not have ketchup and they did not offer us any other sauces.  Dinner is $25 per person.     Pretty expensive for an "average" meal.  Restroom was not clean.  Atmosphere in the restaurant is loud.  Can't really recommend Tucanos.  Better choices exist in Newport News.

owner_response.author: Bonnie S, Public Relations Manager at Tucanos Brazilian Grill, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for your visit and your review. We strive to provide a true escape from the ordinary form the greeting you get when you first walk in to Tucanos, to the last step out the door. We are truly sorry to hear that we did not earn the 5 star review that we strive for, and that you did not see the extraordinary experience that is our standard. We will be sharing your review with our with our service and chef teams so you can feel sure that you will see an experience that is far above average, should you choose to return. We hope to show you the true Tucanos experience very soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response
